item.title: Brand Indigestion
item.description: Today in Tedium: Mascots can be great ways to promote a product, but sometimes they’re full of crap. The Xifaxan intestine, which I’ve been going on about for months now, fits into the latter category. Xifaxan, if you’re not familiar, is a medication for irritable bowel syndrome. Some marketing company somewhere got paid millions of dollars to create an animated character that runs around ready to lose its â€¦ y’know, every time it turns a corner.
